body: If a driver lacks the proper skill to drive a vehicle, the driver can always make a Wisdom ability check instead of the appropriate skill check. The driver can even take 10 or gain the benefits of aid another when using Wisdom instead of the vehicle's normal driving skill.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Vehicles/Full Vehicle Rules/Driving Vehicles/Driving a Vehicle without the Proper Skill
name: Driving a Vehicle without the Proper Skill
